name: Overthrow (mossbag)
description:
After years of subjugation by dragons and other races, a determined group of Kobolds decide to take matters into their own hands, by marching through their tyrannical leader's lair and defeating every last foe.

Throughout the game, you will rescue captured dice-shaped Kobolds from various enemies. These Kobolds can then be gladly flung back at foes for massive damage. But look out! You'll need to manage your dice carefully, or less you might find yourself on the wrong end of the barbeque!
